how_we_export.title: How We Export
how_we_export.description: Our export process is structured to ensure products reach customers safely and efficiently.

steps.title: Order Reception
steps.desc: We receive the order and confirm the details with the customer.

steps.title: Invoice Creation
steps.desc: The invoice is created based on the order details and sent to the customer.

steps.title: Product Packaging
steps.desc: The product is carefully packaged to ensure safety during shipment.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.desc: Products are delivered to customers via trusted shipping services.
